ud8.10:1.2: At one time the Buddha was staying near Sāvatthī in Jeta’s Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s monastery.
ud8.10:1.3: There the Buddha addressed the mendicants,
ud8.10:2.1: “Mendicants, Dabba the MallianThen when he became fully extinguished while sitting in the sky, his body was burning and combusting, leaving neither ashes nor soot to be found.
